variants.text: This event provides access to a curated selection of biotech startups actively seeking funding. Our pitch contest features companies that have been vetted for innovation and market potential.
Get early access to emerging biotech innovations before they hit the mainstream investor circuit. Many past attendees have found their next portfolio company at our events.
You'll have direct access to founders during pitch sessions, networking breaks, and informal gatherings - a more efficient way to evaluate opportunities than cold emails and pitch decks.
Unlike general startup events, we focus exclusively on biotech and synthetic biology, ensuring that every startup you meet is relevant to your investment thesis.
